number_of_top_pairs.description: Number of pairs to be shown on top. (1-4)

lure_percent.description: Percentage of lure trials. Number from 0 to 1. A lure trial is when the incorrect symbol pair on the bottom contains exactly one symbol that is found on the top.(1 unique symbol). A non-lure trial is when the incorrect symbol pair contains exactly zero symbols that match the top. (2 unique symbols.)

lure_position_on_card.description: If a lure trial, must the lure symbol occupy the top position on the the card, the bottom, or either? If either, then the lure symbol will be equally distributed across trials to be in the top and bottom positions.

left_correct_percent.description: Percentage of trials where the left pair is the correct answer. Number from 0 to 1.

countdown_duration_ms.description: Duration of the countdown phase, milliseconds. Multiples of 1000 recommended.

after_countdown_transition_duration_ms.description: Duration, in milliseconds, of the slide in animation after the countdown phase.

interstimulus_animation.description: Should new trials slide in from right to left?

interstimulus_interval_duration_ms.description: If interstimulus_animation == true, the duration, in milliseconds, of the slide in animation after each trial. Otherwise, the duration, in milliseconds, to wait after a trial has been completed until a new trial appears.

instruction_type.description: Type of instructions to show, 'short' or 'long'.

instructions.description: When non-null, an InstructionsOptions object that will completely override the built-in instructions.

show_trials_complete_scene.description: After the final trial, should a completion scene be shown? Otherwise, the game will immediately end.

show_quit_button.description: Should the activity quit button be shown?

show_locale_picker.description: Should the icon that allows the participant to switch the locale be shown?

study_id.description: The short human-readable text ID of the study (protocol, experiment, or other aggregate) that contains the administration of this activity.

study_uuid.description: Unique identifier of the study (protocol, experiment, or other aggregate) that contains the administration of this activity.

document_uuid.description: Unique identifier for this data document.

session_uuid.description: Unique identifier for all activities in this administration of the session. This identifier changes each time a new session starts.

activity_uuid.description: Unique identifier for all trials in this administration of the activity. This identifier changes each time the activity starts.

activity_publish_uuid.description: Persistent unique identifier of the activity. This identifier never changes. It can be used to identify the activity across different studies and sessions.

device_timezone.description: Timezone of the device. Calculated from Intl.DateTimeFormat().resolvedOptions().timeZone.

device_timezone_offset_minutes.description: Difference in minutes between UTC and device timezone. Calculated from Date.getTimezoneOffset().

locale.description: Locale of the trial. null if the activity does not support localization.

activity_begin_iso8601_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp at the beginning of the game activity.

trial_begin_iso8601_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp at the beginning of the trial. Null if trial was skipped.

trial_end_iso8601_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp at the end of the trial (when user selects a card). Null if trial was skipped.

trial_index.description: Index of the trial within this assessment, 0-based.

trial_type.description: Indicates if trial was normal or lure. Null if trial was skipped.

card_configuration.description: Symbols used on cards. Null if trial was skipped.

top_cards_symbols.description: Symbols of the top cards, starting at 0 for leftmost upper card and incrementing by 1 moving right.

top.description: Index of the top symbol within the card, 1-based.

bottom.description: Index of the bottom symbol within the card, 1-based.

bottom_cards_symbols.description: Symbols of the bottom cards, starting at 0 for leftmost card and incrementing by 1 moving right.

top.description: Index of the top symbol within the card, 1-based.

bottom.description: Index of the bottom symbol within the card, 1-based.

response_time_duration_ms.description: Milliseconds from the beginning of the trial until a user taps a response. Null if trial was skipped.

user_response_index.description: Index of user selected response, starting at 0 for leftmost card and incrementing by 1 moving right. Null if trial was skipped.

correct_response_index.description: Index of correct response, starting at 0 for leftmost card and incrementing by 1 moving right. Null if trial was skipped.
